lore: In the Yselhof swamp, the Calumniers built their biggest cityâ€”so vast it can be seen from miles away when viewed from a high vantage point.\n\nCalumnier Fops are expert swordswomen. Recently, many have joined the famous Red Hat faction in Andolin's army after learning magic. One of them, Shavella, rose through the ranks to become a general thanks to her sharp mind and fighting skill.
menagerieDialog: (It's basking lazily in a patch of sunlight, eyes half-closed.)
Your enemies will rue the day they crossed paths with us!
Let's discuss battle strategies. I have a few ideas that might surprise you.
My scales are like armor, forged in the fires of battle!
(It's pacing back and forth, its tail swishing impatiently.)
name: Calumnier Fop
